title: Ark.Alliance.TimeSeries.Service
description: Backend backbone for high-frequency market data. Advanced polynomial approximations (Chebyshev) and geometric pattern matching for forecasting fluctuations.

features.title: Forecasting Fluctuations
features.description: Uses polynomial regression to project short-term price movement depending on volume/depth factors.

features.title: Geometric Analogy
features.description: Pattern matching against historical 'Bull Flags' or 'Head & Shoulders' using formulaic representations.

features.title: Noise Filtration
features.description: Chebyshev filters distinguish high-frequency market noise from genuine trend shifts.

pages.title: Overview
pages.content: The TimeSeries Service is engineered for **ultra-low latency** market surveillance. It acts as a bridge between volatile exchange streams (Binance) and predictive intelligence layers.

pages.title: Mathematical Foundation
pages.content:
**Chebyshev Polynomials of the First Kind:** `T_n(x) = cos(n arccos x)`

**Regression Model:** `y(x) ≈ Σ c_i T_i(x)`

Leveraging **Weighted Least Squares** with Cross-Validation (k=5) to find the optimal polynomial degree for dynamic regularization.

pages.title: Architecture
pages.content:
Binance WS -> MarketDataService (In-Memory Cache & Chebyshev Engine) -> SQLite Persist

Controllers provide REST API access to analysis results.
